permission.message: Allow location access to see pharmacies near you

error.title: Loading Error
error.message: Unable to load pharmacies. Check your internet connection and try again.

database.title: Database Error
database.message: There's an issue with our database. Please try again later.

server.title: Server Error
server.message: Our servers are experiencing issues. Please try again later.

network.title: Network Error
network.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.

client.title: Request Error
client.message: There was an issue with your request. Please try again.

unknown.title: Unknown Error
unknown.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

offline_no_cache.title: No Offline Data
offline_no_cache.message: You're offline and no cached data is available. Please connect to internet to load pharmacies.

network_using_cache.title: Using Cached Data
network_using_cache.message: Unable to fetch latest data. Showing cached results.

empty.title: No Pharmacies on Duty
empty.message: No pharmacies on duty are available at the moment.

offline.title: You're Offline
offline.message: You're offline. Showing cached pharmacy data.
offline.noCacheMessage: No cached data available. Please connect to internet to load pharmacies.

map.locationRequired: Location permission is required to show directions
